explains: vi. 发出轧轧声；发出嘎嚓声；发出轧轧声前进

sentences.en: Why does the last man chug out of a shoe?
sentences.cn: 为什么最后一个人从鞋里蹦出来？

sentences.en: These cheerful little trams, dating back to 1873, chug and sway up the towering hills with bells ringing and people hanging from every opening.
sentences.cn: 这些令人欢快的小缆车可追溯至1873年，咔嚓咔嚓摇摆爬上高耸的山峦。车上铃儿叮当作响，每个窗口都是人。

sentences.en: I stood and watched the train chug around the loop of track without me.
sentences.cn: 我站在那里看小火车吱吱嘎嘎地在环形轨道上自己开着。
